unblock-page.confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to unblock all pages like this one?

block-selection.confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to block the {count} selected {count, plural, =1{page} other{pages}}.

load-comics.effect-failure: Failed to load comics with duplicate pages.

unblock-selection.confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to unblock the {count} selected {count, plural, =1{page} other{pages}}.

add-to-reading-list.confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to add {count, plural, =1{one comic} other{# comics}} to {name}?

consolidate.confirmation-message: This process can take a long time and will move all comics based on the consolidation rules. Are you sure you want to continue?

convert-one.confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to convert this comic to {format}?

convert-selected.confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to convert {count, plural, =1{one comic} other{# comics}} to {format}?

convert-comics.effect-failure: Failed to start the conversion process.
convert-comics.effect-success: Starting converting {count, plural, =1{one comic} other{# comics}} to {archiveType}.

mark-selected-as-deleted.confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to {deleted, select, true{mark} other{unmark}} the selected comics for deletion?
mark-selected-as-deleted.confirmation-title: {deleted, select, true{Mark} other{Unmark}} Comics For Deletion

rescan-comics.confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to rescan {count, plural, =1{one comic} other{# comics}}? This process can take a very long time

set-read.effect-failure: No pudo marcar los cómics como {read, select, true{read} other{unread}}.
set-read.effect-success: {count, plural, =1{one comic} other{# comics}} marcado como {read, select, true{read} other{unread}}.

tooltip.deselect-all: Anular la selección de todos los cómics.

update-metadata.confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to update the metadata on {count, plural, =1{one comic} other{# comics}}?

load-scraping-volumes.effect-failure: No se pudo cargar ningún volumen...

load-scraping-issue.effect-failure: No se pudo cargar la edición...

scraping.scrape-comic-confirmation-message: ¿Estás seguro de que quieres reemplazar los detalles de este cómic?

start-scraping.confirmation-message: ¿Está seguro de que desea reemplazar los detalles de los/las {count, plural, =1{comic} other{# comics}} cómics seleccionados?

tooltip.skip-cache: Raspado será {enabled, select, true{skip} other{use}} la caché de raspado.
